# CMake Info

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# fmt
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set(FMT_PEDANTIC ON)
set(FMT_WERROR OFF)
set(FMT_DOC OFF)
set(FMT_INSTALL OFF)
set(FMT_TEST OFF)
set(FMT_FUZZ OFF)
set(FMT_CUDA_TEST OFF)
set(FMT_OS ON)
set(FMT_MODULE OFF)
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/fmt)
set_property(TARGET fmt PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
